ComicInfo.Penciller: Al Jaffee,Corey Pandolph,Gary Hallgren,Jason Yungbluth,John Caldwell,John Kovaleski,Keith Knight,Mark Fredrickson,Peter Kuper,Scott Bricher,Sergio Aragonés,Ted Rall,Tim Hamilton,Tom Bunk,Tom Richmond,Scott Nickel,Rick Tulka,Tom Bunk,Tom Richmond,Tim Hamilton,Peter Kuper,Scott Bricher,Gary Hallgren,John Caldwell,Sergio Aragonés,John Kovaleski,Keith Knight,Corey Pandolph,Ted Rall
ComicInfo.Summary:
Various short satires of pop culture including a fumetti page "Fundalini Goes To The MTV Movie Awards."
News coverage of foreign countries' Olympic events.
Phony is injured but creates an armored suit than allows him to defeat terrorists and a traitor within his own company.
10 foolish ways to increase your gas mileage.
The Black Spy uses the camouflage of the costumed characters at a comic book convention to his advantage.
A group of fake movie-type posters for other things you experience in a movie theater.
Parody strips replacing Hobbes with Steve Jobs.
A MAD look at bad camp counselors.
Goofy interpretations of superhero movies.
Fake ad to look like Circuit City newspaper circular.

ComicInfo.Title: The Fundalini Pages; Mad's International Preview of the Beijing Olympics; Ironic, Man; 10 Easy Ways To Beat High Gas Prices And Increase Your Mileage; Spy Vs. Spy; Movie Posters For The Rest of The Movie Experience; Calvin And Jobs; John Caldwell's Field Guide to Spotting America's Most Incompetent Summer Camp Counselors; A MAD Look At This Summer's Super Heroes; Sucker City Newspaper Circular; The Strip Club; Drawn-Out Dramas; Mad's Cocky, But Handy Hancock Outtakes
